TopicTitle: Who would you say is the most Kerbal?

Articles.Content:
I got to thinking, who is the most kerbal player on the forums... But Ofc, I then realized there isn't 1 kerbal, 3... Oh wait, 4!!!

So, who IS the most kerbal of all people on this forum? Like which Kerbal and why?

They can be:

Jebediah Kerman: All around badass, not caring about anything else except having a good time.

Bob Kerman: A genius, who is pessimistic as well as realistic about every situation. He knows the risks and the dangers.

Bill Kerman: An awesome problem solver. He isn't fearful, but he isn't as badass as Jeb. He can fix your problem, but not always know why or how he did.

Valentina Kerman: Female Badass, pretty much the same as Jeb but female.

Gene Kerman: A person who will give you things to do as well as help you get there.

Wernher Von Kerman: An intellectual genius who can teach you whatever you need to know about rockets in fine detail.

So, who is the most like this people from the forum? Every day I'll check the results and update here .

Jebediah Kerman: WhackJob

Bob Kerman:

Bill Kerman:

Valentina Kerman:

Gene Kerman:

Wernher Von Kerman:

Edited October 29, 2015 by ZooNamedGames
Regex is Wernher von Kerman
I feel like Xacktar and Whackjob both somewhat fit the role of Jeb.

I nominate Wanderfound for Gene.

(I would feel bad nominating anyone on the forums for Bill)

I nominate Wanderfound for Gene.

(I would feel bad nominating anyone on the forums for Bill)

Everyone is something, besides, if anything else, I'm a great Bill! I can do pretty much anything in KSP, but as to the specifics of how slightly elude me. But I can explain... Somewhat.

There are Bills out there, and it's not a degrading award, but just as awesome as every other .
I nominate Regex for Bob Kerman.
Beale for Wernher von Kerman.
Are there only 6 official kerbals? Geez, it seems like there'd be more...

Jebediah Kerman: Most definitely Whackjob.

Valentina Kerman: One of Frozen_Heart or GreeningGalaxy, they're both pretty damn cool.

Gene Kerman: GoSlash27

Wernher Von Kerman: OhioBob, hands down.

Bill and Bob? Can't really make a suggestion.

gene for me.

using him for as a director and a all round guy.

FlipNascar and MRS are definately Wernher Von Braun. So is Columbia.

I agree that Whackjob is Jeb, but I suggest Kuzz to also be Jeb.

Bob would be... Uh, IDK....

Bill would be MajorJim.

Gene would be Red Iron Crown. Director guy, all that.

Whackjob is Jeb.

Mesklin and fenya are Bill. Seriously, they are crazy good at the game. Engineering!

KasperVld is Mortimer or whoever it is. PR guy.

Wherner ... Maybe Ferram?

Are there only 6 official kerbals? Geez, it seems like there'd be more...

I could go for the full crew, but that's 10 to manage.

I'm more of a mix of Bob and Bill...

But I think Whackjob is definitely a Jeb.
Updated the OP to reflect the votes if WhackJob for Jeb .

Can I be one of them? I don't care which xD

There seems to be a lot of competition for Bill, so I could be Bob maybe. My brother used to call me "Bob" as a baby...

Can I be one of them? I don't care which xD

There seems to be a lot of competition for Bill, so I could be Bob maybe. My brother used to call me "Bob" as a baby...

Supposed to be more vote someone else, but I never said you couldn't vote yourself.

I'll put in yet another "Whackjob for Jeb" vote and also second OhioBob's nomination for Wernher Von Kerman.

Best,

-Slashy
Cupcake for Valentina. He's like Jeb, but competent.

Who's the most Kerbal? Me.

Because I'm short, have a big head, and I turn green whenever I go flying loopy orbits at high velocity!

Wernher Von Kerman: OhioBob, hands down.

Agreed.

I agree that Whackjob is Jeb, but I suggest Kuzz to also be Jeb.

Jeb: Whackjob, like everyone else said

Bob: regex, definitely

Bill: sal_vager (although he does know what he's doing)

Gene: RIC, Alshain

It's kinda difficult to nominate only one or two persons per kerbal, there are so many awesome posters out there, and they do not all fit exactly to one kerbal in particular.
